ğŸŒ Be aware of the weather

With Rain, you can explore the weather in your city and beyond. We offer an array of features to keep you informed and prepared:

  • ğŸŒŸ View Current Weather: Stay up-to-date with real-time weather conditions in your area.
  • ğŸŒ… View Weather by Hour: Plan your day effectively with hourly forecasts.
  • ğŸ“† View the Weather for the Week: Get a week-long weather outlook at your fingertips.
  • ğŸŒ¡ï¸ View Detailed Weather Data: Dive deep into weather statistics for a comprehensive understanding.
  • ğŸŒ Localization: Choose your preferred language from a wide range of options.
  • ğŸ™ï¸ Data Caching: Access weather information even when you're offline.
  • ğŸŒ† Choose Your City: Set your location or add other cities to your list.
  • ğŸ§® Metric or Imperial: Customize your measurement system for temperature and more.
  • ğŸŒ¡ï¸ Celsius or Fahrenheit: Pick your preferred temperature unit.
  • ğŸ•°ï¸ 12-Hour or 24-Hour Time Formats: Adjust the time display to your liking.
  • ğŸ”” Notifications: Receive weather alerts and stay informed.
  • ğŸ§© Widget: Add a weather widget to your home screen for quick updates.
  • ğŸ¨ Beautiful Design

Our application not only offers functionality but also boasts an aesthetically pleasing design. We have meticulously crafted Rain with your user experience as our top priority, guaranteeing both convenience and elegance in a single package.

ğŸŒ Reliable Data Sources

We fetch weather data from Open-Meteo and use Open-Meteo's Geocoding API to help you find cities easily.
